item.title: About me
item.description: Contact - Education - Career - Projects - Awards - Professional activities - Memberships Contact details Dr. Christian Levers Department of Computational Landscape Ecology | Helmholtz Centre for Environmental Research - UFZ Permoserstr. 15 | 04318 Leipzig | Germany Phone: +49 (0) 341 235 482256 Institute for Resources, Environment, and Sustainability | University of British Columbia 2202 Main Mall | Vancouver, BC V6T 1Z4 | Canada School of Public Policy and Global Affairs | University of British Columbia 6476 NW Marine Drive | Vancouver, BC V6T 1Z2 | Canada

item.title: Downloads
item.description: You can download some of my codes from my github site. Repository IBM_OptimalForaging C++ codes for individual-based foraging model described in Zurell et al. (2015) Oikos. Repository Rcodes_MapNovelEnvironments_SDMs R codes for mapping novel environments (SDM inflated response curves and environmental overlap masks) described in Zurell et al. (2012) DDI.
